Lack enough support: The claim that Virginia is the "No. 1 recipient of federal dollars" lacks sufficient evidence or data to support it. Exist alternative explanation: The expert mentions that Virginia receives more federal defense dollars than any other state due to its naval base and shipbuilding industry.
